channel.title: Italian on SEAN'S FOOD BLOG!!

item.title: Specific Dish - Paxti's Spinach Pesto Deep Dish Pizza
item.description: WIWI score: 7.55 WIWI formula for special dishes: WIWI = 0.65(Taste) + 0.35(Value) I still provide service and atmosphere, but it’s not factored into the scoring when doing a specific dish review. It’s all about that grubbbbb WIWI: 7.925 Taste: 9.5/10 Value: 5/10 Service and Atmosphere: 6.5/10 The Breakdown Spinach Pesto Pizza Menu Description: “Fresh spinach, basil-garlic-Parmesan pesto, homemade tomato sauce.” My Take: I’ve eaten deep dish pizza twice in Chicago.
